newsitem.title: USA: GT Interactive unit in pact with Lancit.
newsitem.headline: GT Interactive unit in pact with Lancit.

text.p: Humongous Entertainment, a subsidiary of GT Interactive Software Corp, and Lancit Media Entertainment Ltd said Wednesday they had agreed to create television, motion picture and home video programming based on the characters from Humongous CD-ROMs.
The alliance involves the characters Putt-Putt the car, Freddi Fish and Pajama Sam. Lancit will be the exclusive merchandising and licensing agent for the characters.

Humongous and Lancit will share net revenues from the programming sales and will participate in merchandising-related royalties from sales in product categories based on the programming and related characters, the companies said.
